alternativeAbbreviations: Scott Elliot From Meikle;Scott-Elliot From TL2
alternativeNames: Scott-Elliot, George Francis; Elliot, George Francis Scott
comments: Although TL-2 favours the hyphenated Scott-Elliot, this form of his name only appeared in the Flora of Dumfriesshire and the unhyphenated form was used consistently in all his other works and by other members of his family.
examples: Camarotea Scott Elliot in J. Linn. Soc., Bot. 29: 37. 1891
isoCountries: Uganda, South Africa, Sierra Leone, Madagascar, Tanzania, United Republic of
